channel.title: Pest control (bug pi)
channel.description: im running an isidia x 317 pi base. fixed the portal respawn so u can finish a game now, but u can only do one game, once u beat the first game, the next game once all portals are down it doesn't end, anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: Pest control (bug pi)
item.dc:creator: @Jake2008 Jake2008
item.description:
@Jake2008 wrote:

when you start the game you have to spawn them, not in spawn-config or whatever you did.

Read full topic
